Subject: error: setState_UV  no convergence. dt = ...

Hi All,

I have a question about the method 

ThermoPhase::setState_UV

In =
some cases (usually at T =3D 1000K) this method failes to find the
temperat=
ure solution for the given energy and volume. This method uses
the Newton a=
lgorithm. It is not clear why only half of the Newton
increment (dt) is app=
lied. For the specified tolerance (=3D1.0e-4K) and
the maximum number of it=
erations (=3D50) this approach is not always
working. 
However, the method =
becomes succesful when the complete Newton
increment (dt) is added to the t=
emperature-variable. Does anyone know 

1) what is the reason of using 1/2 =
of dt?
2) why the temperature tolerance passed to the method =3D 1.0e-4K?

=
Alexey
